author: Special Correspondent
text:
A male adult elephant was electrocuted while attempting to cross into a fenced field at Muthiyanur near Thalavadi early on Monday morning.

The elephant aged about 30 years was drawn to the maize crop raised by Madevan. A Forest team led by Thalavadi Range Officer Udhayaraj arrested the farmer and had him remanded in judicial custody.

The elephant was buried at the spot after conduct of post-mortem.
title: Elephant electrocuted
